pages.title: Build With Unibit
pages.description: Unibit is a static site generator that uses the Nunjucks templating system.

params.title: Build With Unibit
params.description: Unibit is a static site generator that uses the Nunjucks templating system.

frontmatter.title: Build With Unibit
frontmatter.description: Unibit is a static site generator that uses the Nunjucks templating system.

pages.markdown: Unibit is a static site generator that uses the Nunjucks templating system.

content.val: Unibit is a static site generator that uses the Nunjucks templating system.

pages.title: Convert Into Other SSGs
pages.description: Unibit is a superset of existing static site generators and can be converted into other SSG's

params.title: Convert Into Other SSGs
params.description: Unibit is a superset of existing static site generators and can be converted into other SSG's

frontmatter.title: Convert Into Other SSGs
frontmatter.description: Unibit is a superset of existing static site generators and can be converted into other SSG's

pages.markdown: Unibit is a superset of existing static site generators, if you build a theme according to the Unibit spec then Stackbit will be able to convert (transpile) that theme into other static site generators like Hugo, Jekyll and Gatsby.

content.val: Unibit is a superset of existing static site generators, if you build a theme according to the Unibit spec then Stackbit will be able to convert (transpile) that theme into other static site generators like Hugo, Jekyll and Gatsby.

pages.title: Connect any Headless CMS
pages.description: Map content and front matter to work with any Headless CMS.

params.title: Connect any Headless CMS
params.description: Map content and front matter to work with any Headless CMS.

frontmatter.title: Connect any Headless CMS
frontmatter.description: Map content and front matter to work with any Headless CMS.

pages.markdown: Learn how to define Content Models and connect your site to any headless CMS.

content.val: Learn how to define Content Models and connect your site to any headless CMS.

pages.title: Home
pages.heading: A Unibit Starter Theme
pages.markdown: Unibit is a superset of existing static site generators. It can be used as a standalone ssg or it can be imported into [Stackbit](https://www.stackbit.com) and seamlessly converted into other static site generators and headless CMS.

content.val: Unibit is a superset of existing static site generators. It can be used as a standalone ssg or it can be imported into Stackbit and seamlessly converted into other static site generators and headless CMS.
